lines.text: Tell us who ye've been seein'.
Dolly Parton.
I can't hear ye.
Dolly Parton!
That fuckin' slut? I knew it. Who else?
Anna Ford... and that Madonna, but just the once.
Scumbag. Bastard. Ya dirty fuckin' prick! You know what this means...
No, no Doreen... not the shite. I can't eat your shite.
I'm gonna shite in your mouth. It's what we both want. Don't deny it.
Shite in my mouth!
COCO FUCKIN' BRYCE!

[Larry is beating Jonny]
Blooter that bastard! Kill the fuckin' cunt! Ya fuckin' knob! He's got our fuckin' electricity! He's got ma fuckin' bairn! Go back to your ma! Lick your ma's fuckin' piss-flaps, ya fuckin' cunt!
So, what's been happening tonight, Brian?
Well, there's the rapist. The guy that stabbed the boy in the shopping centre. And this comedian down here.

Well, I've had a wee word with our rapist. Seems a nice enough young fellow. Tells us the whore was askin' for it. It's the way of the world, Brian. As for the guy that stabbed the boy - well, silly wee bugger, but... boys will be boys. What's the story with this tube-stake?
Caught him smashing up a telephone box.

[disgusted]
Tsk tsk.
Awww, the wee Tom-Tom. Goo goo, ga ga.
Shut your fuckin' mouth, you, ya specky git.

[about to be breast-fed]
Phwoar, ya dirty cunt, ye. You've got some set a' jugs on ye, right enough, doll. Business gear.
You fucked this one up, ya daft cunt.
Eh? What?
You. Bob Coyle. No house, no job, no bird, no mates, police record, sore ribs - all in the space of a few hours. Nice one.
How the fuck do you know my business, eh? What the fuck's it got to do with you, eh?
It's my fuckin' business to know. I'm God.
Away to fuck, ya old radge.
Fuckin' hell... another wise cunt.
I've had a fuckin' hard time, and now I've just met God. The cunt's gonna turn us into an insect.

[Coco, has a baby, has just spoken]
You spoke, Tom.
Aye, I did. Look, sit doon. I mean sit down. Fuck... eh? You'd better not say nowt to no cunt about this, right?
I'm gettin' a wee bit hungry, though, eh.
Oh, I'll take you home and make you something.
Eh, I was thinkin' a wee bit more of the... tit.
